ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

Has your teen or young adult ever been prescribed medical marijuana?
Has your teen or young adult ever been prescribed medical marijuana? If yes, how often?
Has your teen or young adult ever used CBD?
Has your teen or young adult ever used CBD? If yes, how often?

Do you have a medical marijuana/cannabis prescription?
IN THE PAST YEAR, how often, if at all, have you used marijuana/cannabis for medical reasons (e.g., to treat or decrease symptoms of a health condition).
Notes: 0= I have never used this; 1= Have used, but not in the past year; 2= Monthly or less (in the past year); 3= 2-4 times a month (in the past year); 4= 2-3 times a week (in the past year); 5= 4 or more times a week (in the past year)

ElementDescription: (If mar2 = 2-5/Have used in the past year) In the PAST 30 DAYS, on how many days did you use marijuana/cannabis for medical reasons (e.g., to treat or decrease symptoms of a health condition).
IN THE PAST YEAR, how often, if at all, have you used marijuana/cannabis for non-medical reasons (e.g., for pleasure or satisfaction, to have fun)
Notes: 0= I have never used this; 1= Have used, but not in the past year; 2= Monthly or less (in the past year); 3= 2-4 times a month (in the past year); 4= 2-3 times a week (in the past year); 5= 4 or more times a week (in the past year)

ElementDescription: (If mar4 = 2-5/Have used in the past year) In the PAST 30 DAYS, on how many days did you use marijuana/cannabis for non-medical reasons (e.g., for pleasure or satisfaction, to have fun).
(If mar3 or mar5 greater than 0) When you used marijuana/cannabis in the PAST 30 DAYS, how did you use it? Check all that apply: I have not used marijuana in the past 30 days
